room.title: Room
alerts.screenshotComingSoon: Screenshot feature coming soon! (Requires canvas reference from ThreeCanvas)
homepage.hero.subtitle: Where imagination meets 3D creation. Draw walls, place furniture, and bring your dream spaces to life with physics-based interactions.
homepage.features.title: Endless Creative Possibilities
homepage.features.subtitle: From drawing your first wall to sharing masterpieces, every step is designed to spark creativity and learning.
homepage.features.buildRoomDesc: Draw walls, add doors and windows with intuitive 3D tools
homepage.features.furnishDecorateDesc: Drag and drop furniture with realistic physics
homepage.features.shareCreationsDesc: Take screenshots and share your dream rooms with friends
homepage.features.earnRewardsDesc: Collect coins to unlock premium furniture and decorations
homepage.cta.title: Ready to Start Building?
homepage.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of young creators and start building your dream room today. No downloads, no setup - just pure creativity!
academy.title: ROOMI Academy
academy.subtitle: Master the art of 3D room building with our interactive tutorials and guides
academy.tutorials.yourFirstRoom.title: Your First Room
academy.tutorials.yourFirstRoom.descript: Learn the basics of drawing walls and creating your first 3D room
academy.tutorials.wallTechniques.title: Wall Techniques
academy.tutorials.wallTechniques.descrip: Master advanced wall drawing techniques, doors, and windows
academy.tutorials.furniturePlacement.des: Discover how to arrange furniture and create cozy spaces
academy.tutorials.colorLighting.title: Color & Lighting
academy.tutorials.colorLighting.descript: Learn about color theory and lighting to make rooms beautiful
academy.tutorials.sharingCreations.title: Sharing Your Creations
academy.tutorials.sharingCreations.descr: How to take amazing screenshots and share with friends
academy.tutorials.advancedBuilding.title: Advanced Building
academy.tutorials.advancedBuilding.descr: Create complex multi-room layouts and architectural details
academy.learningPath.title: Recommended Learning Path
academy.learningPath.courseDescription: Follow our structured 6-lesson course to become a room building expert
footer.description: Created with love for young creators everywhere. Safe, fun, and educational.
